ygData.subject: Re: Looking for item
ygData.msgSnippet: I have a crude stein someone gave me, but do not have a clue where it came from or how to use it.  It says it does minor healing, but I don t know how to use
ygData.messageBody:
I have a crude stein someone gave me, but do not have a clue where it came
from or how to use it. It says it does minor healing, but I don't know how
to use it. Could someone please give us the run down on this crude stein?
Is it a single use item, how to use, etc. Thanks so much.

Mik
-----Original Message-----
From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com <EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com>; EverQuest@onelist.com
<EverQuest@onelist.com>; EQ_Neriak@onelist.com <EQ_Neriak@onelist.com>;
EQ_Potters@onelist.com <EQ_Potters@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, June 12, 1999 10:33 AM
Subject: [EverQuest] Looking for item


>From: kale usi <kaleusi@...>
>
>Will pay good PP for a Crude Stein or the information leading to me
>obtaining one (on Bertoxx server). Serious offers/info only. Please respond
>if interested.
